text: The yellow turban warband is crushed. Hailing from Qingzhou, the survivors offer their servitude. Cao Cao gathers them under his banner and dubs them Qingzhou Troops.
Perhaps you can bring them into your fold...
A yellow turban warband has invaded your territory. You must defeat them.
Zhuge Liang has brilliantly engineered a new weapon. It is a crossbow that fires several bolts simultaneously to overwhelm the enemy.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Qiang barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Wuhuan barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Xiongnu barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Shanyue barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Qiang barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Wuhuan barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Xiongnu barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Shanyue barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
It's hard to believe, but it might be worth investigating personally.
There's a rumor about a nearby village. Each night, a huge monster terrorises the peasants. The villagers seek a hero to comb the mountains and drive out the beast.
You agree with your men and prepare to descend.

A few days after you and your men began searching the mountains, you come across an incredible sight. The den of a large white tiger and its family. The men are intimidated by its size and implore you to go back. You feel as if the massive tiger is staring at you.

After an epic struggle, you slay the enormous white tiger. Then, unexpectedly, the other tigers prostrate themselves as if submitting to your might! These white tigers don't seem to be ordinary beasts.
You give up the hunt and return. However, for reasons unknown, the monster attacks stopped.
It's best to ignore these annoying preachers.
A group of unusual men sporting shaved heads disembark from a ship.  They claim to have journeyed from distant lands to spread the teachings of Buddha. Perhaps it will be worth supporting them?
This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
Sogdians from the west has been spotted entering our borders. We will be able to purchase fine goods or hire Sogd mercenaries soon.
Indeed, the goods brought by the western merchants are diverse, with many rare and valuable items. Furthermore, the mercenaries escorting them look like natural warriors.
You decide not to avail yourself of their wares.
You are rather taken with a peculiar sword.
You are rather taken with a fine steed.
You hire a Sogdian mercenary group.

Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...

We have contacted the Xiongnu and verified that the kidnapped woman is indeed Cai Yan. She has become the concubine of a Xiongnu chieftain. However, the Xiongnu offer to release Cai Yan for a significant sum of gold.
You do not make deals with barbarians.
Cai Yan is free once more.
A Xiliang colonel has joined your faction.
You may now recruit Xiliang units
You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Jingchu troops.
You may now recruit Jingchu units
You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Danyang troops.
You may now recruit Danyang units
We have gathered warriors from nearby nomadic peoples to form a powerful cavalry unit. These formidable cataphracts will crush your enemies.
You may now recruit Ironfist Cavalry
Thanks to your patronage of scholars and men of talent, your officers have made progress on the path to enlightenment.
A few of your officers have gained additional experience.
This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.

Chunyu Qiong finally came to his senses! He is no longer a drunkard but a general who can lead an army.
Unlocks elite Northern Army Captain Retinues
Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Gongsun Zan. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.
Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Dong Zhuo. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.
Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
The captain of the centre, inspector of the professional Northern Army, has pledged his allegiance to Yuan Shu. He now has a formidable force at his disposal.

A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Lu Bu's defeat, his daughter Lu Ji seems to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.

A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Yuan Shu's defeat, his generals Zhang Xun, Ji Ling and Yan Xiang to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
You allow them to join your cause.
You allow them to join your cause.
Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
A regiment of the Northern Army will join your faction.
The path to prominence in these turbulent times is by the sword! Win battles to demonstrate your capability.
Wars are a costly endeavour and one cannot hope to end this chaos without a sizable treasury. Show all under heaven that you possess China's wealth.
Cement your rule with legitimacy! Build an Imperial City that will be the envy of other warlords. All under heaven will look to you for leadership.

All economic activities have been hampered by the minting of a new coin. We have no choice but to wait for merchants to adjust to the new standard.
We've run into problems purchasing grain with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for farmers to adjust to the new standard.
We've run into problems paying the troops with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for soldiers to adjust to the new standard.

Completing these missions will gather northern colonels to your cause.

None of the other warlords in China are as noble or accomplished as you are. Bring order to chaos and officers who were once loyal to the Han Dynasty will flock to your banner. Defeat your rivals and accumulate wealth to expand your power.
Complete missions to bolster your faction!
Lu Bu's army follows your faction.
Yuan Shu's army follows your faction.
The Last Kin of the Dong Zhuo

A group of beggars appears before you. Among them, a girl dressed nicely comes forward and bows. The girl identifies herself as Dong Bai, the last kin of the tyrant Dong Zhuo, and begs you to take her.
There is no sin against this innocent girl.
The Last Kin of the Dong Zhuo

A group of beggars appears before you. Among them, a girl dressed nicely comes forward and bows. The girl identifies herself as Dong Bai, the last kin of the tyrant Dong Zhuo, and begs you to take her.
There is no sin against this innocent girl.
The house of Dong is destroyed.

Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...

It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...

Once again the flames begin to burn. Now we are ready to destroy the Han dynasty. Our forces are strong, and the old comrades who had to live in hiding will also appear and respond to us. Let's make sure that Zhang Jue's unfulfilled dream come true.
Thousands of comrades across China will rise against oppression.
